name: MEC Flyer Tights - Women's
description:
Get outside in questionable weather. For multi-sport lives, these are a versatile layer to wear for winter riding, skiing, snowshoeing and anything that gets your heart rate boosted. They have wind-proof front panels and breathable fabric across the back. The overall matte finish keeps them from looking too techy. A softly brushed inner feels nice against your skin, a boon when the conditions start to get a little hostile.Front panels are wind-blocking nylon, polyester, spandex, blended with polyurethane.DWR finish sheds any light precip.Back panels are nylon and spandex with a soft  brushed fleece interior.Internal drawcord at waist.Articulated knees provide a full range of movement.Reflective trim runs across the back of  the thigh.Inseam is 28.75in.Zippers at ankles have reflective trim.Gripper elastic at ankle holds them in place.

Body fit, Regular rise



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
